subject: A third-party OAuth application has been added to your account
content: Hey RaveloMevaSoavina! A third-party OAuth application (freeCodeCamp.org) with user:email scope was recently authorized to access your account. Visit https://github.com/settings/connections/applications/80a8e8840a91a529831e for more information. subject: Coming soon: Updates to our Terms of Service
content: Hi MEVA SOAVINA, We’re writing to give you a heads up that our User Agreement will be updated on 14 July 2021. Starting on that date, you will be able to sign in to Coinbase to accept the new User Agreement.
